original_title: Dream Big: A Big Gigantic Story
overview: It’s been a long road for saxophonist/producer Dominic Lalli and drummer Jeremy Salken to “ROWDYTOWN IV,” the fourth installment of their massive hometown experience.  Their journey is beautifully captured in this documentary short  film which chronicles the duo’s history and how they broke saxophone into dance music alongside a compelling behind the scenes look at producing the Rowdytown show.
title: Dream Big: A Big Gigantic Story
